sentences: Sean Nicholas Savage (born 1986) is a Canadian singer-songwriter and musician from Edmonton, who is a member of the Arbutus Records and Canadian indie music scene.
Sean Nicholas Savage has released exclusively on Arbutus Records, and was one of the first artists to join the label after its inception in 2009.
Savage has had a number of notable collaborations, including a production and vocal credit on Solange's number-one album on the Billboard 200 in the United States.
